title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions: Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect solution to keep you warm and cozy during the colder months. This ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan is ideal for use in your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. With three modes including 750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation, you can customize your comfort level. Safety features such as automatic shutoff at 45 degrees and overheat protection give you peace of mind. Plus, this compact heater delivers heating in just 2 seconds, making it the perfect choice for rapid heat generation. With a noise level below 45 dB, you can enjoy quiet operation. Don't let the cold weather get you down - stay warm and comfortable with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater.

Introducing the KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat! This sleek and efficient ceramic portable heater fan is the perfect addition to your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. With three modes to choose from (750W heating, 1500W heating, and air circulation), you can customize your comfort level with ease. Safety is a top priority with overheat protection and automatic shutoff at 45 degrees, giving you peace of mind while staying warm. And with its quick 2-second heating delivery, you'll be cozy in no time. Plus, at just 2.6 pounds, it's easy to move around for maximum convenience. Don't sacrifice warmth for noise – this heater operates at a quiet level of below 45 dB. Get your KISSAIR Compact Space Heater today and experience rapid heat generation, low thermal resistance, and intuitive controls for ultimate comfort.

Featuring three modes - heating 750W, heating 1500W, and air circulation - you can customize your comfort level to suit your needs. Safety is a top priority with overheat protection and automatic shutoff at 45 degrees, giving you peace of mind while it's in use.

The PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element ensures rapid heat generation, delivering warmth in just 2 seconds. And with a noise level below 45 dB, you can enjoy quiet operation while staying warm.

Don't let the cold weather get you down. Stay toasty with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater - the perfect blend of performance, safety, and convenience.
